name: wisemove solutions
tag_list: offshore-software-developers, outsourcing-custom-software-services, third-party-software-developers, isv, saas, india, it-consulting, quality-analysis, qa, testing, product-companies, programming, porting, maintenance, microsoft-windows, mobile, wireless,
overview:
WiseMove Solutions creates Rich Internet Web 2.0 Applications using open source technologies such as PHP, Coldfusion, Python, Ruby, Drupal, Joomla, Perl. Also we are using RIA technologies such as Flex/Flash, AJAX are used by WiseMove Solutions to develop cutting-edge integrated Web solutions that deliver results quickly.

We offer its extensive experience to build interactive & efficient Rich Internet applications development solutions for it’s global client base. We offer custom solutions according to customized needs of clients. We have created several custom Rich Internet Applications for a variety of industry vertical for clients globally.Whether you need a dynamic database driven website or a full-featured, large-scale RICH INTERNET APPLICATION, we can offer you Hi-end solutions and services, which are custom built and tailored to meet your specific needs
